text: Eulogius (born Yuri Vasilyevich Smirnov; 13 January 1937 - 22 July 2020) was a Russian Orthodox prelate. He was the figure head at the Russian Orthodox Eparchy of Vladimir between 1990 and 2018. Metropolitan Eulogius died on 22 July 2020, aged 83.Из руин восстанавливал Свято-Данилов монастырь: В Москве скончался митрополит Евлогий Retrieved 28 July 2020 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian Orthodox Christians Category:Eastern Orthodox bishops
title: Eulogius (Smirnov)
